018package org.opengis.metadata.quality;
019
020import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
021
022import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
023
024
025/**
026 * Validity of data specified by the scope with respect to time.
027 *
028 * <h2>Standardized values</h2>
029 * In order to achieve well defined and comparable quality information, it is recommended to
030 * report data quality using {@linkplain Measure quality measures} listed in ISO 19157 annex.
031 * The temporal validity may be treated with the same data quality measures as for {@link DomainConsistency}.
032 *
033 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD)
034 * @author  Alexis Gaillard (Geomatys)
035 * @version 3.1
036 * @since   2.0
037 */
038@UML(identifier="DQ_TemporalValidity", specification=ISO_19157)
039public interface TemporalValidity extends TemporalQuality, TemporalAccuracy {
040}
